title: United Nations Global Compact – Official Participant
description: InnoThink officially joined the UN Global Compact, the world's largest corporate sustainability initiative with 15,000+ participants across 160+ countries. This commitment affirms InnoThink's dedication to the UN's ten principles on human rights, labor, environment, and anti-corruption, and aligns the company with the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). As a participant, InnoThink contributes to advancing responsible business practices, global cooperation, and sustainable innovation.

title: You Are Safe – Civic Tech Hackathon Winner
organization: UNDP / Consul Democracy Foundation / Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Denmark / RBK Tunisia
description: Developed during a 24-hour hybrid international hackathon co-hosted by UNDP, Consul Democracy Foundation, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Denmark, and RBK Tunisia. The challenge was to design technology advancing democracy, civic participation, and human rights. You Are Safe is a secure civic platform that enables anonymous reporting of harassment and violence, while visualizing high-risk areas through an interactive heatmap to support institutional response and public safety. Key Achievements: Led ideation and delivered final pitch before UNDP and Consul Foundation delegates; Designed a youth-centric UX optimized for safety, clarity, and ease of use; Built anonymous reporting flow and dynamic heatmap with React & MongoDB; Aligned platform with UN Sustainable Development Goals and Consul's open-source democracy vision; Achieved seamless teamwork and full delivery under a strict 24-hour deadline.

title: CEO Water Mandate – UN Global Compact Commitment
organization: United Nations Global Compact / Pacific Institute
description: Through InnoThink, endorsed the CEO Water Mandate, a UN Global Compact initiative advancing water stewardship, sustainability, and corporate responsibility. This commitment aligns InnoThink with a global network of companies and institutions driving progress toward the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

title: CIX Summit 2025
description: Represented Tunisia's innovation ecosystem at Canada's leading innovation summit. Pitched Voyagr to international investors and actively engaged in high-level roundtables, B2B meetings, and business workshops. Positioned as a global founder driving cross-border innovation on the international stage.

title: ISO 9001 Quality Management Certification
description: InnoThink received ISO 9001 certification for quality management systems, demonstrating commitment to operational excellence and currently working on ISO 27001.

title: ByteDance Recognition – Content Moderation Innovation
description: Recognized for leading a pilot initiative to test GIF and gaming content moderation while working on TikTok (ByteDance) moderation through Concentrix. Maintained a 0% error rate, ranked top in internal KPI challenges, and proved the effectiveness of the workflow. Following its success, GIF and gaming content moderation was officially integrated into ByteDance's global moderation operations within two months.

title: Collision Summit 2023
description: Honored as the youngest entrepreneur to participate with the Tunisian Embassy delegation. Represented Tunisia's innovation ecosystem at North America's fastest-growing tech conference, pitched Voyagr to international investors, and led B2B meetings for three companies. Received official recognition from both the Tunisian Ambassador to Canada and the Canadian Ambassador to Tunisia for being the youngest delegate and for outstanding contributions to strengthening Tunisia–Canada tech relations, fostering diaspora entrepreneurship, and driving cross-border innovation partnerships.

title: AWS Partner Network (APN) Membership
description: Secured official partnership for InnoThink within the AWS Partner Network, gaining access to AWS Partner Central, technical and marketing support, and the Partner Scorecard. This milestone provides eligibility for Select and Advanced tiers and strengthens InnoThink's positioning as a trusted technology partner in cloud innovation.

title: EcoVadis Sustainability Certification
description: InnoThink achieved EcoVadis sustainability rating certification, recognizing commitment to environmental and social responsibility.
